content: To start, he often jumps up to float in the air a moment, tossing one sword after another at you, with the second sword landing a little farther past you. He'll then leap towards you and slash as he grabs both swords, ending with a mighty spinning slash to catch you trying to score a hit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Venom Daoist (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
To start, he often jumps up to float in the air a moment, tossing one sword after another at you, with the second sword landing a little farther past you. He'll then leap towards you and slash as he grabs both swords, ending with a mighty spinning slash to catch you trying to score a hit.
